fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a TiMob project using Tabbed template
2. Package for Mobile Web
3. Place packaged project on a local server
4. Access website through any browser e.g. Chrome, Android's browser, iPhone's browser

Actual: Icon images are missing in the tab. See attachment.
Expected: Icon images should appear.

Note: When you Run As > Mobile Web Preview in Browser or Emulator, the icon images appear.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Tabbed Template - Icon images does not appear on the tabs
